message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $120. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  While I can't go as low as $90, I'm willing to come down to $110.  This product is truly top-notch and worth every penny.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
